thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to read the contents of a file using the 'read_file' command.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the 'read_file' command can help me get the contents of a file and use it in my program.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'read_file' command to read the contents of a file.
- Specify the filename of the file to read.
- Check if the file exists.
- If the file exists, open the file in read mode.
- Read the contents of the file.
- Close the file.
- Output the contents of the file to the user.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to read files that are critical to the operation of a program or system.
thoughts.speak: I think it would be useful to read the contents of a file using the 'read_file' command. Shall I proceed?
